title: In the new roadmap video when Reav3 is talking about the new support, subtitles say "purrfect".
body:
I'm thinking either cat boy or cat girl Vastaya.

He also calls it whimsical so I'm thinking a child Vastaya?

He also winks when he says the word attached which implies some kind of mechanic relating to attachment.

Discuss.

replies.body: Yordle with a cat familiar.

> [{quoted}](name=KestrelGirl,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AkbBQa08,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-25T21:31:31.835+0000)
>
> Yordle with a cat familiar.

Take it up a notch.  Yordle throws cat familiar into enemy's face, where it attaches itself.  Blind for the duration.  Removal deals damage.
I'd prefer a cat boy enchanter, since we already have a whimsical Suppordle.
You're trying to make it happen. I respect it

Please no more child characters we just had Zoe, Nunu, and Neeko and they're annoying enough for a while.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

Neeko isnt a child.

Nunu has been around for years.
Neeko is just as much of an adult as Zoe is.
Neeko is significantly more mature than Zoe she just holds different values from a different culture.

I'd be HIGHLY disappointed if it's yet another female Vastaya. We already have Neeko, Xayah, Ahri, and Nami. I hope it's a boy, and I hope it's not a Vastaya.

I was hoping it'd be whimsical in the way that Kled is whimsical. In that they'd be just as obliviously happy to cook you in a stewpot as they'd be to show you how to find the closest road.
Amumu hasn't been considered a yordle in ages. His lore even leaves him ambiguous.

Fair enough, I always consider him to be a yordle. But even if we leave him out, still means 10 male yordles vs 3 female.

________________

Still think him being a yordle is more likely than not. Not long ago, when Teemo had his birthday palooza, Amumu was listed by riot in the categorie "Teemos yordle allies". And when yordles got the splash art update, unifying them by all having 4 fingers on each hand, Amumus splash arts got updated alongside the other yordles.

I take these as evidence that even if the lore is ambigious, Amumu is considered a yordle by Riot internally.

Yet if you go by fingers, Fizz breaks that cause he has 3.  Though in his lore update he was said to be an aquatic Yordle.  So, there's many things that don't perfectly align when trying to look at what makes a Yorlde a Yordle.

The splashart updates for yordles giving them 4 fingers was in February 2017.
Fizz got changed to a yordle in November 2017.
So yeah, he breaks the pattern, but that is simply because he wasn't considered a yordle when they changed the splash arts. Still see this update as evidence that Amumu counts as a yordle.

Yeah but we're also lacking on male enchanters.

{{champion:117}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:267}} .

As in we have no proper male enchanters.

None.

So I really want a humanish cat boy Vastaya.

Closest we have is Rakan and Taric who are hybrid catcher and warden.
Agreed, if the champion isn't a yordle then I prefer them to be male. Just if they are yordle, then female would have priority for me. We need more cute yordle girls. :(

But a whimisical support yordle girl would just be stomping on Lulu's toes with steel boots, a boy yordle however would be better because, then they're just normal boots.

Though definitely agree to more female yordles.  I've done two concepts for female yordles myself :)
Yordle pls. I just want Bandle City to be a thing so that Universe could be considered kinda 1.0

"Enchantress support"

That's a cat girl that will sell a lot of skins.

That was referring to nami actually.

She was our last enchantress support.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AkbBQa08,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-01-26T01:46:32.035+0000)
>
> That was referring to nami actually.
> 
> She was our last enchantress support.

If you look closely, he only said "the last one being Nami", he used the word "enchantres" to tell us that all their previous supports were males, I'm thinking they will probably go back to a tradtional role.
i think "don't get too attached" means that this yordle/vastayan can charm enemies
Holy necropost.
Female Yordle, the skin is the 'Cat' part of the Vs event.

Okay he winks when he says "Completely by the book" and winks when he says "Attached". There is a book in the teaser picture shown, and something next to it that looks similar to Zoe's amulet. So im thinking it will most likely be a champion from Targon.
I'm hoping for some kind of feline yordle

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AkbBQa08,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-25T21:25:45.305+0000)
>
> subtitles say "purrfect"

Technically, the caption reads, "puurfect."  Not sure if that's a typo or an intentional alternate spelling, referring to something else.  Usually when people extend purrs they keep the double r, even in the common "purrfect" blend.

I missread the caption then mb.

He does extend the ER sound when he says perfect so I get the feeling it's still referencing a cat.
